text:
e="preserve">Stanley Benjamin Kirsch (July 15, 1968 – January 11, 2020) was an American actor, screenwriter, director, and acting coach. He was born in New York City. He has made guest appearances in some TV shows including "JAG", "Family Law", and "Friends".
Kirsch appeared in the short-lived Saturday morning TV series "Riders in the Sky" and on the soap opera "General Hospital" in 1992.
On January 11, 2020, Kirsch was found dead in his Los Angeles home, aged 51. The cause of death was suicide by hanging.
